## Type of Change
<!-- Mark the relevant option with an 'x' -->

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)

- [ ] CI/CD or build configuration changes

## Checklist
<!-- Mark the relevant items with an 'x' -->

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style (run `make fmt`)
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing tests pass locally (run `make test`)
- [ ] I have updated `CHANGELOG.md` to describe my changes (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated documentation (README.md, docs/, or code comments) if needed
- [ ] No new warnings generated by `go vet ./...`
